title: Handle a Player Being Waived
description: A team decides to release a player from their contract. The GM must place the player on waivers.

tasks.description: Inform the player and their agent of the team's decision.
tasks.expected_outcome: The player and agent are officially notified.

tasks.description: Submit the official waiver request to the league office.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the player on the league's waiver wire.

tasks.description: Monitor the waiver wire to see if the player is claimed by another team.
